all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Now, verily I say unto you, that through the redemption which is made for you is brought to pass the resurrection from the dead.
Doctrine and Covenants 88:14
Quote of the Day
"The real destination of discipleship is literally to become as Jesus Christ is."
Elder Michael B. Strong | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
